name: amplion
description: Lightweight ADHD friendly YouTube music player

scripts.typecheck: bunx tsc -p tsconfig.main.json --noEmit && bunx tsc -p tsconfig.preload.json --noEmit && bunx tsc -p tsconfig.json --noEmit
scripts.start: bun run build:main && bun run build:renderer && bun run build:preload && bun run build:settings-preload && electron .
scripts.dev: bun run build:preload && bun run build:settings-preload && bunx concurrently "bun run dev:renderer" "bun run dev:main" "bun run dev:electron"
scripts.dev:renderer: VITE_BUILD_MODE=index vite build --mode development && VITE_BUILD_MODE=settings vite build --mode development && bunx concurrently "VITE_BUILD_MODE=index vite build --mode development --watch" "VITE_BUILD_MODE=settings vite build --mode development --watch"
scripts.build:renderer: VITE_BUILD_MODE=index vite build && VITE_BUILD_MODE=settings vite build
scripts.build:preload: bunx tsc -p tsconfig.preload.json --noEmit && bun build src/preload/index.ts --outfile=build/preload/preload.js --format=cjs --target=node --external=electron
scripts.build: bun run build:main && bun run build:renderer && bun run build:preload && bun run build:settings-preload && electron-builder
